tasks.label: üéµ Music: Start Daemon (Direct)
args: $py = 'c:\workspace\agi\fdo_agi_repo\.venv\Scripts\python.exe'; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $py) { Start-Process -FilePath $py -ArgumentList 'c:\workspace\agi\scripts\music_daemon.py' -WindowStyle Hidden -PassThru | Format-Table Id,ProcessName,StartTime; Write-Host '‚úÖ Music Daemon started' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '‚ùå Python venv not found' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 }

tasks.label: üéµ Music: Check Status
args: $proc = Get-Process -Name 'python' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_.CommandLine -like '*music_daemon.py*' }; if ($proc) { Write-Host '‚úÖ Music Daemon is running' -ForegroundColor Green; $proc | Format-Table Id,ProcessName,CPU,WorkingSet } else { Write-Host '‚ùå Music Daemon is not running' -ForegroundColor Red; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Python: Coverage Report (repo venv)
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/.venv/Scripts/python.exe') { & '${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/.venv/Scripts/python.exe' -m pytest -q --tb=short --basetemp fdo_agi_repo/.pytest_tmp --cov fdo_agi_repo --cov-report term-missing:skip-covered } else { python -m pytest -q --tb=short --basetemp fdo_agi_repo/.pytest_tmp --cov fdo_agi_repo --cov-report term-missing:skip-covered }

tasks.label: Python: Coverage HTML (generate)
args: if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/.venv/Scripts/python.exe') { & '${workspaceFolder}/LLM_Unified/.venv/Scripts/python.exe' -m pytest -q --tb=short --basetemp fdo_agi_repo/.pytest_tmp --cov fdo_agi_repo --cov-report html:outputs/coverage_html fdo_agi_repo/tests } else { python -m pytest -q --tb=short --basetemp fdo_agi_repo/.pytest_tmp --cov fdo_agi_repo --cov-report html:outputs/coverage_html fdo_agi_repo/tests }

tasks.label: Python: Open Coverage HTML
args: $ws='${workspaceFolder}'; $p=Join-Path $ws 'outputs\coverage_html\index.html'; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $p) { Invoke-Item -LiteralPath $p } else { Write-Host 'coverage_html not found. Run Python: Coverage HTML (generate) first.' -ForegroundColor Yellow; exit 0 }

tasks.label: Python: Coverage HTML (ensure + open)
args: $ws='${workspaceFolder}'; $p=Join-Path $ws 'outputs\coverage_html\index.html'; $covDir=Join-Path $ws 'outputs\coverage_html'; $venvPy=Join-Path $ws 'LLM_Unified\.venv\Scripts\python.exe'; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $p) { Invoke-Item -LiteralPath $p; exit 0 }; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $venvPy) { & $venvPy -m pytest -q --tb=short --maxfail=0 --basetemp fdo_agi_repo/.pytest_tmp --cov fdo_agi_repo --cov-report html:outputs/coverage_html fdo_agi_repo/tests } else { python -m pytest -q --tb=short --maxfail=0 --basetemp fdo_agi_repo/.pytest_tmp --cov fdo_agi_repo --cov-report html:outputs/coverage_html fdo_agi_repo/tests }; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $p) { Invoke-Item -LiteralPath $p; exit 0 }; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath (Join-Path $ws '.coverage')) { if (!(Test-Path -LiteralPath $covDir)) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path $covDir -Force | Out-Null }; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $venvPy) { & $venvPy -m coverage html -d $covDir } else { python -m coverage html -d $covDir } }; if (Test-Path -LiteralPath $p) { Invoke-Item -LiteralPath $p; exit 0 } else { Write-Host 'coverage_html not found after generation and coverage fallback.' -ForegroundColor Yellow; exit 0 }

tasks.label: ?Âç†ÏèôÏòô Comet-Gitko: Stop Task Queue Server
args: $jobs = Get-Job | Where-Object { $_.Command -like '*task_queue_server*' }; if ($jobs) { $jobs | ForEach-Object { Stop-Job -Id $_.Id; Remove-Job -Id $_.Id }; Write-Host '??Task queue server stopped' -ForegroundColor Green } else { Write-Host '?Âç†ÏèôÌàò No running task queue server found' -ForegroundColor Yellow }

tasks.label: ?Âç†ÏèôÏòô Comet-Gitko: Check Server Status
args: try { $response = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'http://localhost:8091/api/health' -TimeoutSec 2; Write-Host '??Task Queue Server is ONLINE' -ForegroundColor Green; Write-Host "Response: $($response.Content)" -ForegroundColor Cyan } catch { Write-Host '??Task Queue Server is OFFLINE' -ForegroundColor Red; Write-Host '   Start it with: Comet-Gitko: Start Task Queue Server' -ForegroundColor Yellow }
